repos_data.description: arttime is a terminal application that blends beauty of text-art with functionality of clock / timer / pattern-based time manager ⏰. One can also display customized dynamic feed of information like weather, news, stocks, system metrics and etc.

arttime is a terminal application that blends beauty of text-art with functionality of clock / timer / pattern-based time manager ⏰. One can also display customized dynamic feed of information like weather, news, stocks, system metrics and etc.
